title: Bug 23935: Text widget with Tree parent does not lose focus
description: Both widgets are children of the shell. The issue occurs only on Windows. It is possible to work around the issue by creating the text editor as a sibling of the tree and positioning it above the tree.
OB: When clicking anywhere in the tree, the tree retains focus.
EB: When clicking anywhere in the tree, the tree should lose focus and the clicked location should receive focus instead.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Open the application. 2. Click anywhere within the tree widget. 3. Observe that the tree retains focus instead of the clicked location.
